entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:47 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:47 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
